body: This tour begins with a scenic drive up the coast to a privately owned rustic ranch. Your wrangler will guide you on a beautiful horseback ride that winds through the forest and up into the Santa Ynez Mountains where you will enjoy spectacular views of the Pacific Ocean and the Channel Islands. After the ride you will be driven to a popular local restaurant for lunch (lunch not included in price). We will then escort you to two of the regions top wineries where you will enjoy some of California’s finest wines. Tour price includes door to door transportation, 90 minute horseback ride, and tasting fees. Tour returns to Santa Barbara at approximately 4:00 pm.
title: Horseback Riding and Wine Tasting Tour

email.startTime: 8:15am-8:30am (we will call you on your cell phone when we are almost there to pick you up).
email.private: (If you would like to make your tour private please call our office at (805) 564-1819. There is a one-time fee of $150 to buy out the vehicle.)
